info.name: LLM Backend - Triage Service
info.description: API collection for testing the LLM-powered support ticket triage service. Four examples: one per flag (requires_human, is_abusive, missing_info, is_vip_customer), with priorities Low, High, Urgent, and Normal. Select a Postman environment (e.g. Local) so requests use the correct base_url, protocol, host, and port.
